title: Nursing Simulation-Based Electronic Medical Record (eMR) Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Real-time simulation education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately apply standard terminology required for electronic observation charts and nursing records with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can perform at least three steps of eMR update procedures in response to patient condition changes based on simulation scenarios.
Learners can identify five or more types of errors that may occur when writing electronic medical records through online assessment questions and suggest correction strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
